alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 2:23AM PST until February 15 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph gusting 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times, and high profile vehicles may experience travel challenges, especially along west to east routes. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
